Name: Ocean-Hued Clam
Title: Memories of the Deep: Ocean-Hued Clam
Desc: "Bringing hopes and memories from the depths, permeating long-lost civilizations and history, these graceful and exquisite crowns slide into the forgotten rifts with their owners."

Talent.Name: Ocean-Hued Clam
Talent.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Heal the attached character for 2 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sea-Dyed Foam</color>. (Maximum of 2)
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character deals DMG:</color> Consume all <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sea-Dyed Foam</color>. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
